pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Based Causal Feature Selection for General Response Types // Extends invariant causal prediction (Peters et al., 2016, doi:10.1111/rssb.12167) to generalized linear and transformation models (Hothorn et al., 2018, doi:10.1111/sjos.12291). The methodology is described in Kook et al. (2023, doi:10.1080/01621459.2024.2395588).
